About

Hi there, I'm Joey, a dedicated software engineering student on a journey to become a software developer and UI/UX designer. I'm passionate about coding and crafting user-friendly digital experiences. My goal is to bridge the gap between functionality and aesthetics in technology. When not studying, I enjoy reading and singing and look forward to what the future holds in the tech world. Let's connect and learn together!

UI/UX Designer & Software Developer.
